full_output.summary: Experienced Android Developer with 2+ years specializing in Java and Kotlin, adept in MVVM/MVC architectures, UI/UX design, API integration, and database management. Proficient in Android Studio, Gradle, and testing frameworks, with strong problem-solving and communication skills, committed to industry best practices.

projects.name: TWINE4CARWEATHER
projects.description: Developed a smart weather application designed for automotive integration. The application utilizes real-time weather data to enhance driver safety and convenience by providing current weather conditions, alerts, and driving condition forecasts.

projects.name: MDM/MAM
projects.description: Project to validate application and policy configuration management for a fleet of trucks. The project includes a core workflow for developers, admins, and fleet managers, focusing on app approval, policy setup, and seamless configuration management for truck groups.

projects.name: EMPLOYEE MANAGEMENT
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive Employee Management application to streamline the process of adding, viewing, editing, and deleting employee details within an organization. The application provides an efficient and user-friendly interface for HR personnel to manage employee records. The project was implemented using both Jetpack Compose for Android and React Native for cross-platform mobile.

projects.name: TASK MANAGEMENT
projects.description: Developed a task management application designed to allocate tasks to individuals, track task progress, and evaluate personal performance. The application enables users to start and complete tasks while recording time and date, providing a comprehensive performance tracking system. The project was implemented using both Jetpack Compose for Android and React Native for cross-platform mobile support.

projects.name: DAIMLER TAP LAUNCHER
projects.description: Project prioritized redirecting to Fleet Launcher when available. Home launcher launches Fleet Launcher if present; else redirects to Daimler Tap Launcher.

projects.name: DAIMLER DEVICE ONBOARDING
projects.description: This application is to send the complete truck application and configurations to Daimler cloud. In this application we will be registering the truck and send the installed application list and application details to Daimler cloud and also we will send the status of wifi, navigation and bluetooth to the cloud in a periodic interval of 2 minutes. This app handles silent installation and uninstallation of application based on the version of the software versions received in backend from the truck.

projects.name: AIRPORTZO
projects.description: Airportzo is an awesome service aggregator platform to provide online booking for various travel-related ancillary services like Meet & Assist, Visa Assistance, Duty Free etc.
